Class Summary
RunReadBIF Support for reading the XML BIF format.
RunWriteBIF Support for writing the XML BIF format.
SkimmerEstimator On smaller files costs about 13% or parse time, on larger files only costs about 4% of parse time.
UAI06Parser This class is intentionally stripped down, with the hope of achieving the fastest possible performance on the UAI '06 input files.
